content.rendered:
WordPress 3.9 was released yesterday (April 16), and is fully supported by the current version of Piklist. This latest version of WordPress comes packed with lots of new features that enhance your publishing experience.

Since Piklist uses default WordPress functions, these enhancements are ready for you as soon as you upgrade to 3.9. An updated visual editor (TinyMCE 4.0) that supports drag-and-drop image uploads, and better image gallery previews is fully supported with the Piklist “editor” field. To activate the new drag-and-drop image uploads, just add this parameter to the piklist field options array: drag_drop_upload => true. The new Audio and Video playlist feature will work out of the box.

As always, if you run into any difficulty and need some help, please post on our support forum.
